item.title: About/Contact
item.description: Rob Hunter holds a PhD in Politics from Princeton University and is a member of the Legal Form editorial collective. He uses this site as a peg on which to hang his email address. He also blogs on it at very irregular intervals. You can contact him by email at jrh at rhunter dot org.

item.title: Writing
item.description: Peer-Reviewed “The Digital Turn and the Ethical Turn: Depoliticization in Digital Practice and Political Theory.” boundary2 online. August 2, 2018. Essays and Polemics “Capital and Climate in the Critique of the State.” Legal Form. June 6, 2019. “Brett Kavanaugh and the Global Practice of Constitutionalism.” Legal Form. October 9, 2018. “Elaborating the Material Constitution.” Legal Form. June 30, 2018. “Crises of Constitutionality.” Legal Form. February 23, 2018. (Reposted at Critical Legal Thinking, March 5, 2018.
